DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the accuracies and the capillary and venous comparabilities of five different home glucose monitors; Optium Xceed, Contour Ts, Accu-chek Go, One Touch Select and Ez Smart in an adult population.
DOC.brief_title: Investigating the Accuracy of the Home Glucose Monitors in Hypoglycemia
DOC.criteria: Being under investigation for pituitary adrenal functions Diabetes mellitus or any other chronic metabolic disease Taking medicine for any reason Anemia Polyctemia Compromised circulation Hypoxia
DOC.keyword: Subjects are being investigated for the integrity of
pituitary-adrenal functions by insulin hypoglycemia test.
